content: crochet baby octopus pattern using these materials the finished toy is 6 15cm languages - english american terms you can crochet a toy from any other yarn but you will have to choose the size of the hook and yarn by yourself the pattern consists of - pdf file with detailed instructions - 8 pages of a description of the crochet process - 14 process photos the pattern does not contain crochet lessons you should already have basic crochet skills difficulty level easy begginer list of required materials 1 yarn himalaya dolphin baby 100g/120m or analogue 2 hook size 3 5 mm 3 safety eyes size 12 mm 4 holofiber filler 5 yarn yarnart jeans 50g/160m for muzzle design 6 scissors needle for sewing you can contact me if you have any questions about the pattern thank you very much for purchasing my crochet toy pattern ekaterina chirkova / chirka_toys
